text: Easy Tea Co. is a MillerCoors company devoted to selling 5% ABV lightly- carbonated tea-flavored 24-oz. canned beverages with a "crisp citrus flavour" targeted at Gen-Xers. The amount of alcohol is comparable to beer. Easy Tea Co marketing manager Melissa Wagamon said, "We're excited to bring people a hard iced tea with just the right amount of sweetness." ==References== Category:Alcoholic drinks Category:Tea
title: Easy Tea Co.
